Description: Fragment of flattened handle of a probably Rhodian pottery transport amphora at neck join, downturning. Clay fine light orange-brown; cream surface. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: G. Cankarde-Senol and Н. В. Ефремов identify this stamp as Knidian.
Petrie noted several such stamps in his 1884-5 diary (EES Archive XVII 47).
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0445)
